VRDisplayCapabilitiesCanPresent.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The canPresent read-only property of the interface returns a boolean value stating whether the VR display is capable of presenting content (e.g. through an HMD).

blockquote.para: Note: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: This is useful for identifying "magic window" devices that are capable of 6DoF tracking but for which is not meaningful. If canPresent is false, calls to will fail, and will return null.

-WebVR API homepage
